summary: Removed misleading omega-rule/omega-saturation comments from Bundle/ modules. Updated TruthLemma.lean (4 sections), Completeness.lean (1 line), and README.md (1 line) with accurate explanations that the temporal backward proofs use structural properties (temporal_backward_G/H) and MCS maximality, same pattern as modal_backward.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting all comment changes across 3 files

completion_data.completion_summary: Removed misleading omega-rule comments from Bundle/ modules, replacing them with accurate explanations that temporal backward proofs require structural properties (temporal_backward_G/H) using MCS maximality by contraposition, the same pattern as modal_backward in BMCS. Updated documentation in TruthLemma.lean, Completeness.lean, and README.md.
